information: FDRP, a processor of deep-frozen organic fruit and vegetables, is a company based at Avignon in the South of France. For over 20 years, our business has been 100% devoted to organic farming. In fact, organic farming represents all the values we subscribe to. Out business is to set up organic vegetable segments directly with farmers or farmers' groups in France, and also in neighbouring countries such as the Benelux, Spain, Italy and so on. That enables us to offer our customers deep-frozen organic fruit and vegetables in a variety of cut sizes and packs. We offer a wide range of deep-frozen organic products: - Deep-frozen organic vegetables, - Deep-frozen organic fruit, - Deep-frozen organic herbs, - Deep-frozen organic condiments, - Deep-frozen organic dried vegetables, - Deep-frozen organic preparations and purées, - Deep-frozen organic vegetable mixes, - Deep-frozen organic fruit mixes. We are committed to only selling organically-farmed produce, to managing the waste arising from our activity and combating food wastage.
